synopsis.text: Sometimes, the line between life and death is as delicate as a single sheet of paper. In the remote northern mountains, a community thrives under the divine blessings of the mountain gods. As a rite of passage into adulthood, a young boy embarks on his first hunt, seeking the elusive 'Kuroshishi.' The mountains, while generous, can also be treacherous, revealing the harsh fangs of nature. The boy's journey into the depths of the wilderness marks the beginning of a thrilling adventure, where survival hangs in the balance.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
